title: Iragai Pole lyrics Nan Mahaan Alla Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Iragai pole alaigirene undhan pechai ketkayaile
Kulandhai pole thavalgireneundhan parvai theendayaile
Thozhayamal thozhayaindhene undhan kaigalennai thottadhum
Karaiyamal karaindhene un muchukaatru pattadhum
Aniyaayak kadhal vandhadhey adangadha aasai thandhathe
Ennakule edho minnal pola thottuchendradhey

Kannoram kadhal vandhaal kanneerum thithipaagum
Verondum thevaiyillai Nee mattum podhum podhum
Ennodu neeyum vandhal ellame kaiyil serum
Verondum thevaiyillai Nee mattum podhum podhum

Koodavandhu ne nirpadhum kooduvittu naan selvadhum
Thodarudhey thodarudhe nadagam
Paadhi mattume sollvadhum meedhi nenjile enpadhum
Puriyudhey puriyudhey karanam
Nerangal theerudhe vegangal koodudhe
Poove un kannukulle boomipandhu suthutdey

Kannoram kadhal vandhaal kanneerum thithipaagum ...
Verondum thevaiyillai Nee mattum podhum podhum

Heyyy ennanadho yedhanadhio illamal pochey thookam
Kanne unnai kanaamal naanillai
Enmeehile unvaasani eppodhum veesapaarkiren
Anb unnai seraamal vazhvillai
Ne ennai kaanbathey vaanavillai pondradhey
Dhoorathil unnai kandaal thooral nenjil sindhuthey

Kannoram kadhal vandhaal kanneerum thithipaagum ...
Verondum thevaiyillai Nee mattum podhum podhum

seo.title: Iragai Pole lyrics Nan Mahaan Alla Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Iragai Pole lyrics Nan Mahaan Alla Song Lyrics from Naan Mahaan Alla. Read the lyrics penned by Yugabharathi and composed by Yuvan and sung by Tanvi Shah. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Yugabharathi, Naan Mahaan Alla, Yuvan, Tanvi Shah, Yuvan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
